items.sentence: When Tom heard the news, he was disappointed.
All Tom needs is a little love and affection.
Tom has a doctor's appointment today at 2:30.
I've decided to tell Tom about what happened.
I thought that Tom would be in Boston by now.
Tom said that he saw the invisible man today.
It'll be hard to find someone to replace Tom.
I bought these jeans last week at your store.
Can you identify the man who did this to you?
We keep a spare key hidden under our doormat.
